typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		MovieID as string,
		MovieTitle as string,
		Category as string,
		Rating as string,
		RunTimeMin as string,
		ReleaseDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100) ~> Dwhsource
Dwhsource alterRow(upsertIf(not(isNull(MovieID)))) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		MovieSK as integer,
		MovieID as string,
		MovieTitle as string,
		MovieCategorySK as integer,
		MovieRatingSK as integer,
		MovieRunTimeMin as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['MovieID'],
	skipKeyWrites:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	mapColumn(
		MovieID = Dwhsource@MovieID,
		MovieTitle = Dwhsource@MovieTitle
	)) ~> DwhSinkMovies
